import React from 'react'; const Dashboard = () => { const dummyLessons = [ { title: 'Introduction to Sign Language', uploaded: '2025-07-15', views: 120 }, { title: 'Fingerspelling Basics', uploaded: '2025-07-13', views: 87 }, { title: 'Common Signs for Daily Use', uploaded: '2025-07-10', views: 102 }, ]; const totalStudents = 34; const totalLessons = dummyLessons.length; return (

Instructor Dashboard

Total Students

{totalStudents}

Lessons Uploaded

{totalLessons}

Recent Lessons

{dummyLessons.map((lesson, index) => ( ))}
Title Uploaded Views
{lesson.title} {lesson.uploaded} {lesson.views}
); }; export default Dashboard;
